prompts: Create a celestial-type Pokemon that looks like a star with a glowing core and a colorful tail.
Imagine a Pokemon resembling a small asteroid with a rocky texture and vibrant spots.
Show me a Pokemon with a round, bumpy body and cosmic patterns that can float in the air.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the essence of space, with a dark surface and bright accent colors.
Design a cute Pokemon that has a unique shell shape and can change colors in different environments.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a meteorite, with a rugged appearance and shiny elements.
Make a Pokemon with a round body and tiny eyes, showcasing a mix of earthy and vibrant colors.
